languages.text: "Сам{mf||а} понимаешь, времена нынче неспокойные. Не хочу, чтобы что-то пошло не по плану".

traits.locale_text: "Сам{mf||а} понимаешь, времена нынче неспокойные. Не хочу, чтобы что-то пошло не по плану".
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."
languages.original_text: "Сам{mf||а} понимаешь, времена нынче неспокойные. Не хочу, чтобы что-то пошло не по плану".

traits.locale_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."
"Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."
"Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."
"Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."
"Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

languages.text: “如你所知，现在的日子很不太平，我希望一切都能按计划进行。”
languages.original_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

traits.locale_text: “如你所知，现在的日子很不太平，我希望一切都能按计划进行。”

languages.text: «Corren tiempos difíciles, usted lo sabe bien. Quiero que todo vaya según lo previsto».
languages.original_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

traits.locale_text: «Corren tiempos difíciles, usted lo sabe bien. Quiero que todo vaya según lo previsto».

languages.text: "Devir kötü. Her şeyin plana göre gitmesini istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

traits.locale_text: "Devir kötü. Her şeyin plana göre gitmesini istiyorum."

languages.text: 「ご存じの通り、時間というものは厄介でね。すべてが計画通りに進んで欲しいんだ」
languages.original_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

traits.locale_text: 「ご存じの通り、時間というものは厄介でね。すべてが計画通りに進んで欲しいんだ」

languages.text: « Les temps sont durs, comme vous le savez déjà. Je veux que tout se déroule selon mes plans. »
languages.original_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

traits.locale_text: « Les temps sont durs, comme vous le savez déjà. Je veux que tout se déroule selon mes plans. »

languages.text: "Es sind schwierige Zeiten, wie Ihr wisst. Ich möchte, dass alles nach Plan verläuft."
languages.original_text: "Times are troubled, as you know. I want everything to go according to plan."

traits.locale_text: "Es sind schwierige Zeiten, wie Ihr wisst. Ich möchte, dass alles nach Plan verläuft."
